model

Class PreferenceMetaData

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.PreferenceMetaData

  • public class PreferenceMetaData
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains essential information that links an SMV model to a preference specification. As soon as a preference reasoner is created, this class loads and initializes the preference reasoning session with information such as the SMV model file name, and associated file names such as model checker's trace output, counter example generated, and verification results.
    Author:
    gsanthan

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String counterExampleFile
      Name of file that stores the counter example generated by the model checker during verification
      java.lang.String outputFile
      Name of file that stores the model checker's output trace
      java.lang.String resultFile
      Name of file that stores the verification results of the model checker
      java.lang.String smvFile
      Name of file containing SMV model specification
      java.lang.String[] variables
      Preference variables used in the SMV model
      java.lang.String workingFile
      Name of file that contains the original SMV model and the properties to be verified

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PreferenceMetaData()
      If using this constructor, all the meta data regarding the preference variables, file names of the working files that will be used for verification of properties, storing the model checker trace output, counter example generated by the model checker, and verification results must be set manually.
      PreferenceMetaData(java.lang.String smvFile)
      Loads preference variables used in the preference specification from the SMV model; sets the file names of the working files that will be used for verification of properties, storing the model checker trace output, counter example generated by the model checker, and verification results.
      PreferenceMetaData(java.lang.String[] variables, java.lang.String smvFile)
      Sets the preference variables used to the parameter variables; and parses the SMV model file to set the file names of the working files that will be used for verification of properties, storing the model checker trace output, counter example generated by the model checker, and verification results.
